attributes.action: Jobcentre stopping benifit for people who really need it
attributes.additional_details: I think it is wrong for benefit to be stopped or reduced for those people who are looking for work.There are not alot of jobs out there.How are we expected to apply for jobs that are not out there or jobs that need experience that not alot of people have.The job agreement is state apply for 6 jobs,but how can we if nothing new comes out and is the same jobs every time that alot of people just can not do.It is wrong to stop benefit or reduce benefit.It puts stress on familys and put us into more poverty and debt.
